sentences.en: Aim : To study the diagnosis and treatment of ependymoma in conus medullaris and cauda equine.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨圆锥马尾部室管膜瘤的诊断及手术治疗特点.

sentences.en: But every race is a complex equation? a balance of economics, athleticism, equine grace and conscience.
sentences.cn: 赛马竞技掺有复杂的因素,经济上的平衡 、 运动竞技 、 马的优雅和人类的良心.

sentences.en: Cattle are immune to equine infections anemia.
sentences.cn: 牛不感染马传染性贫血.

sentences.en: Donkeys are related to horses, and both are part of the equine family.
sentences.cn: 驴是马的近亲，两者都是马科家庭的一员。

sentences.en: Feelto take your gissa - job brochure , your equine miserable face anywhere daft to employ you.
sentences.cn: 别拘束,拿上你的‘给我个工作’宣传册 、 抱上恋马情结、带上苦瓜脸,去蠢到会雇你的什么地方吧.

sentences.en: He has a long equine face.
Microsatellites are used for parentage testing in all equine genetic laboratories around the world.
sentences.cn: 微卫星在世界所有马的遗传实验室都用于亲子鉴定.

sentences.en: The characteristic movement that an equine makes when given a vaccine or has his hooves trimmed.
sentences.cn: 马所做的一种特征性运动,当给它注射疫苗的时候或者给它修蹄的时候.

sentences.en: The frothy sweat of a horse or other equine animal.
sentences.cn: 汗珠马或马类的泡沫状汗水.

sentences.en: The only available hyperimmune serum was of equine origin.
sentences.cn: 唯一可得到的超免疫血清来源于马.

sentences.en: The oval equine faces. Temple , Buck Mulligan, Foxy Campbell . lantern jaws.
sentences.cn: 一张张椭圆形马脸的坦普尔 、 勃克·穆利根 、 狐狸坎贝尔、长下巴颏儿.

sentences.en: Unfortunately , it is even less easy when it comes to choosing our equine partners.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 当我们要选择马术伙伴的时候,困难还要大的多!

trans.tran_cn: 马的，似的，似马的，马科的马的，[动]马的，似马的，马科的
trans.tran_en: relating to horses, or looking like a horse
